definition: a sturdy thickset short-haired breed with a large head and strong undershot lower jaw, to throw a steer by seizing the horns and twisting the neck, as in a rodeo
details:
noun
- a sturdy thickset short-haired breed with a large head and strong undershot lower jaw
verb
- to throw a steer by seizing the horns and twisting the neck, as in a rodeo
= example: to throw a steer by seizing the horns and twisting the neck, as in a rodeo
- to attack viciously and ferociously
= example: to attack viciously and ferociously
